title: Hour 1 - (06-23-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - (06-23-20)
description:
Dan talks about the unity shown by all the driving teams in Nascar at Talladega. Dan Says that the rally of support shows how the actions of Bubba Wallace has made an impact on the sport.
